thread.section_title: The Logo Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Logo Company | thelogocompany.net
thread.title: Christian
thread.title_full: The Logo Company reviewed by Christian

author: Christian
title: Christian
text:
The Logo Company is now going to be the logo company that I'm going to recommend to others...Very professional in their approach...and easy to work with. The last company I went with for a logo design was priced much higher, yet the quality and professionalism was nowhere near what TLC displayed. I'm just sorry I didn't find them sooner.
Thanks guys!..I'll be back to order some business cards in the very near future.
